proposedChanges.value: Add a concise subheadline below the main headline for clarity.
proposedChanges.rationale: Enhances understanding of core value proposition quickly.

proposedChanges.value: Position the solution section before the problem section.
proposedChanges.rationale: Shows how the product solves needs immediately, aiding comprehension.
risks: May confuse users new to the problem

proposedChanges.value: Ensure the hero CTA stands out with a distinct color and larger size.
proposedChanges.rationale: Increases the likelihood of interaction by drawing attention.

proposedChanges.value: Place trust indicators near the hero section for immediate visibility.
proposedChanges.rationale: Builds credibility right from the start, enhancing trust.

proposedChanges.value: Use client testimonials and case studies as proof elements.
proposedChanges.rationale: Provides real-world validation, increasing user confidence.

proposedChanges.value: Simplify pricing layout into a tiered structure with clear benefits.
proposedChanges.rationale: Easier for users to compare and select appropriate plans.

proposedChanges.value: Stack hero elements vertically on mobile to improve readability.
proposedChanges.rationale: Enhances mobile experience by maintaining focus on key elements.

proposedChanges.value: Implement a sticky CTA on scroll to maintain conversion focus.
proposedChanges.rationale: Ensures CTA is always accessible, boosting conversion opportunities.

risks: Changes may disrupt current user flow
